reviews.title: Great Hotel in Praha

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitively recommend it to my friend!
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel - worth a stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place was clean, great interior and a good price. Good location, nice bar with great Mojitos and helpful staff. The breakfast was excellent for a hotel buffet breakfast, nice room and a comforatble bed. Loved it. Nice design hotel. Top choice.
reviews.title: Great place

likes.liked: — Great and fun Decor, good bar
likes.disliked: — Conferences can talke over hotel and restuarant was closed because of conference

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would rate the Yasmin as the 4 star it says it is. Very modern, nice helpful staff, fantastic breakfasts! and although we didnt use the restaurant apart from the breakfast it all looked very nice, and reasonably priced. Mojito coctail scrummy! and bar prices very reasonable for a Hotel.
reviews.title: Could not fault Yasmin Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is nothing to fault this hotel unless you want lovely views as there arent any from the hotel windows unless some of the rooms look out over Weneslas square?
reviews.title: Great Hotel but a few minor problems

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For a weekend break that wasn't my priority but a nice Hotel was,
reviews.title: Couldn't fault it...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: and that it definitely was. I wouldnt hesitate to recommend The Yasmin to anyone.
reviews.title: Great, stylish hotel - but had a 'special' personal experience
Loved it!!!
reviews.text: Having stayed in a lot of hotels, I have to say that this Hotel is excellent value for money, with a great location and friendly staff . The noodle bar downstairs is very tasty and resonably well priced. Brekie is fantastic also! Well done Yasmin!!

We've just returned from a 2-night stay at the Yasmin Hotel. It's in a great location - approx 10/15 minute walk to main sights. The hotel is very modern and stylish, yet clean and comfortable at the same time. Although the rooms didn't have great views, they were a decent size and were very clean.
reviews.title: Stylish, friendly hotel

likes.disliked: — rude guests at the breakfast buffet!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was great with a big selection and fresh food was brought out continually.
reviews.title: Just great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reception staff and porter were fabulous - very friendly and knowledgable.
reviews.title: Modern design that doesnt quite follow through

likes.liked: — The design, the location and the tranquility
likes.disliked: — lack of basic facilities (Tea/Coffee Making facilities and iron and ironing board)

reviews.text: Just a great hotel. Wonderful design and location. I am a bit puzzled about the last reviewer's remarks about a kettle as I have seldom seen these in Europe outside the UK. The prices in the bar were very reasonable and they do a lovely hot spiced apple in the evenings. The only thing I could complain about is the dinners which were at best average but was good not to go ot on a cold night! Breakfast was, as has already be said, really good with a fantastic selection. I would certainly stay here again.
reviews.title: Stylish place in centre of Prague

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just got back from 4 days in Prague staying at the Hotel Yasmin. What a find!!! excellent location, cut through the back door and you are straight onto Wenseslas square. We walked everywhere from here.
reviews.title: Hotel Yasmin... a little gem

likes.disliked: — no tea/coffee maknf facilities in room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The choice at breakfast was superb and staff very helpful.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay at yasmin.

reviews.text: Our room was spacious and very clean with a LARGE bed. You get 2 quilts but this was fine. We asked for an extra pillow and they were sent up to the room immediatly. Just wish there was tea making facilities in the room.
reviews.title: Central, affordable, good quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reception staff were excellent and are happy to help whenever they can.
reviews.title: Could Not Fault It

likes.disliked: — not an issue but tea/coffee facilities in room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definatly use this hotel again.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel but

likes.disliked: — Having booked for dinner bed & breakfast, we experienced problems almost every evening when choosing from the menu. Kept being told we had a restricted menu for noodles only
